sources.title: Warhead (1977)
sources.description: A weapons expert is reluctantly sent on a mission to a middle-east warzone to locate a lost nuclear warhead and dismantle it before it falls into the wrong hands. But before he can complete his work, he is taken prisoner and thrust into the conflict, and finds himself looking out for more than just the warhead Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/warhead-1977/

metadata.Plot: A weapons expert is reluctantly sent on a mission to a middle-east warzone to locate a lost nuclear warhead and dismantle it before it falls into the wrong hands. But before he can complete his work, he is taken prisoner and thrust into the conflict, and finds himself looking out for more than just the warhead.
metadata.Writer: Buddy Ruskin, Patrick Foulk, Donovan Karnes
metadata.Actors: David Janssen, Karin Dor, Christopher Stone
